item.title: Kamala Harris:: CausalImpact
item.description: I want to look at the effect Kamala Harris’ performance in the first presidential debate on the volume of articles being written about her. There was an idea that Harris was under represented by the media coming up to debates. But the confrontation with Biden has earned her campaign more attention ## Analysis report {CausalImpact} ## ## ## During the post-intervention period, the response variable had an average value of approx.

item.title: Learning Plumber
item.description: I’ve been meaning to figure out plumber for a while. Have gone through some of the chapters in the plumber book a couple of times, but nothing has stuck so far. So I don’t know who I seen say it, but I’m going to try writing about plumber to force myself to learn the tool. Why? I’m really interested in getting R into production. I work for a company where I’m the only data scientist; most of my work is helping folks understand products better, and do research on techniques / tools that can help us with data focused products.

item.title: About
item.description: A blog from John Flynn Data Analysis, R, Text Mining, Politics, Forecasting, Philosophy of Language … Possibly rants about raising twins … mostly curmudgeonly rants from a weirdo
